story:
Why Does This Exist?

Hello there! If you are reading this, congratulations! You have stumbled upon a project of grave importance for all citizens of the world.

Not really.

My name is Kelsey Miller. I am a business student in New England majoring in Corporate Finance and Accounting with a minor in Creative Writing. Yeah, that's a pretty weird combination, I know, but it led me to being accepted as one of about 150 interns at the Cannes Film Festival!

You could say that I'm excited.

I created this campaign in order to pay off the last expenses of the internship (like airfare), but the purpose of this project is to fund a book I'll write about my time in Cannes. I published a book back in 2011, so if you're thinking that this might be some teenager's travel diary, have no fear! It will be an insightful and entertaining look into life at the festival.

And to be completely honest, if my book can motivate students to pursue careers in the film industry (even if they're business students, like me) or even to cultivate a love of traveling, that would be AWESOME. I think that would be the most rewarding thing for me.

If that sounds pretty cool (and believe me, it is) then take a look at these nifty perks I have in conjunction with the project.

 

What I Need 

Okay, so like literally everything these days, this internship is pretty expensive. I've already covered some of the costs, like the $3500 program fee, but I'll need a little help covering the rest. 

Here is what my campaign funds will cover: 

Publishing the Book: Of course, there will be costs associated with publishing the book. Luckily, with Amazon's publishing services, Createspace and Kindle Direct Publishing, these costs are minimal. They should be around $25. I'm not kidding. 

Airfare: I have to actually get to Cannes, yeah? Luckily, I should be able to use frequent flyer miles to get to Paris, but then I'll need a second flight all the way down to Nice, which is a town (or ville, as they say in France) over from Cannes. This round-trip flight should cost around $400.

Gown: I know what you're all thinking; this is just an excuse to go shopping. Nope. Not at all. I'm actually not a shopaholic (I get tired--walking around malls all day is exhausting). However, there is a strict dress code at Cannes, and they'll actually kick you out of an event if you're not dressed correctly! That would be pretty humiliating, for both myself and my employer, so I want to make sure I have a nice gown to wear to these events. I think $500 should buy a decent gown, which is actually a low amount for a formal outfit.

Food: I have to survive, you know. I'd like about 50 Euros a day to spend on food, since I'll have to take care of two meals per day. So, for ten days of food that will be $650, because of the exchange rate. I'm pretty excited, because Cannes has all of these markets where you can buy fresh food. I'll also be able to parler en Français!

Business Cards: This is a job, after all. I'll need to have a way for people, like my employer, to contact me. I've already set up some cards on Moo.com, which total $100. That's for 200 business cards.

This totals to $1,675. Of course, I'd also like to some additional funds, like spending money to buy something for my mom, a newer camera to update the blogs with SUPER AWESOME photos, and a second gown, so that people don't begin to suspect I smell. 

However, going over my goal can only result in GOOD THINGS for the people funding my campaign, like extra perks and SURPRISES.

Hint, hint.

Also: My campaign is flexible, which means that whatever money is raised I'll keep, regardless of whether I raise the amount listed. If, by some unbelievably unfortunate circumstance I cannot raise all of the funds, I'll put the money toward these areas in order, starting with the publishing costs and ending with business cards.

ONE MORE THING: You'll notice that I'm not asking for $1,675. That is because Indiegogo will take out 4% of the money as a commission (it's 9% if it is not fully funded) and 3% for credit card processing. On top of this, I may have to pay taxes on the funds received (it's hard to know for sure, since current legislature was written before the era of crowdfunding, but I'm assuming I'll have to pay taxes). Federal, state, and local taxes come to 19% of my income.

So, I can expect 26% of the funds I raise to be taken out before I see even a penny. Therefore, I need to take this into consideration when setting a goal for my campaign. 

This new amount comes to $2,264, which is what you'll see in the Funding Goal.

 

What You Get

And now for what you're all really interested in--the perks. Just like in the festival, there is a hierarchy to these perks, starting out with the lowly intern and ending with the godlike producer. Best of all, these perks are cumulative, so if you sign up for one a few links up the chain, you'll get all the perks below it!

Excited yet? 

Here is a better explanation of each perk, including an explanation of the prices:


THE INTERN

People who contribute $10 will receive access to a blog updated in real-time with pictures, excerpts from the book, videos, and more. I know what you're thinking; I can just find it on the internet! Not so. This blog will be SUPER SECRET, which means you can only access it if you have a password. You'll also get a shout-out in the acknowledgements.

Why the price?

About 31% will be taken out for Indiegogo's processing fees and my taxes (this is higher than the 26%, in case the total is not raised and I have to pay a higher fee to Indiegogo), so $3.10 will be removed from the contribution before I even see it!

Approximate total cost of this perk: $3.10

So, $6.90 is actually contributed toward my campaign (the $1,675 I actually need) with each INTERN, and if 227 people contributed with this perk, my campaign will be fully funded, since the amount that is immediately taken out drops from 31% to 26% once the campaign reaches the goal (more is contributed to the $1,675 with each perk when this happens).

 

THE ACTOR

If you contribute $25, you will receive a digital copy of the book, which will come in two formats: PDF and Kindle. You will also receive the INTERN perk. 

Why the price?

Again, 31% will be taken out right away, which is $7.75. Also, if you select a Kindle copy, it will cost $1 to send it with the correct formatting.  

Approximate total cost of this perk: $8.75

So, $16.25 is actually contributed toward my campaign with each ACTOR, and if 91 people contributed with this perk, my campaign will be fully funded.

 

THE FILMMAKER

If you contribute $50, you will receive a signed copy of the book, as well as a personalized thank-you note. You will also receive the INTERN and ACTOR perks. If the contributor is shipping internationally (outside the U.S.) it will be an additional $15.

Why the price?

Again, 31% is taken out, which amounts to $15.50. There will be an additional $1 in cost if you select a Kindle Copy. It will cost $5.80 to ship the book and thank-you note to the contributor within the U.S., based on the flat rate of Media Mail with the USPS.

It will also cost at least another $5 to buy the book (Amazon has to make money, too) and some other amount to ship it to me so that I can sign it. That amount is harder to estimate, since I will buy the total number of books needed at once, and that will spread the shipping costs over the books ordered. Let's say that amount is $1. I'll also need to buy a bunch of thank-you notes, so that will probably be $.50 a card.

Approximate total cost of this perk: $28.80

So, $21.20 is contributed toward my campaign with each FILMMAKER, and if 46 people contribute with this perk, my campaign will be fully funded.

 

THE SELLER

If you contribute $100, you will receive a postcard from Cannes, as well as exclusive photos not found on the blog. You will also receive the INTERN, ACTOR, and FILMMAKER perks. If the contributor is shipping internationally (outside the U.S.) it will be an additional $15.

Why the price?

  • 31% is immediately taken out for Indiegogo (again, assuming the goal is not reached, so that I'm not surprised by additional costs) and for taxes, which is $31.
  • $1 if the contributor selects a Kindle Copy
  • $5.80 to ship the book, thank-you note, and photos
  • $6 to buy and ship the book to me to sign for the contributor
  • $.50 for the thank-you note
  • $1.15 to send the postcard from Cannes
  • $1.30 to buy the postcard in Cannes
  • $1.90 to buy printed copies of the photos

Approximate total cost of this perk: $48.65

So, $51.35 is contributed toward my campaign with each SELLER, and if 23 people contribute with this perk, my campaign will be fully funded.

 

THE DISTRIBUTOR

If you contribute $250, you will receive a mystery gift from the festival, which could be anything from souvenirs to a movie star's used coffee cup (probably not that one; that would be creepy). You will also receive the INTERN, ACTOR, FILMMAKER, and SELLER perks. If the contributor is shipping internationally (outside the U.S.) it will be an additional $15.

Why the price?

 

  • 31% is immediately taken out for Indiegogo (again, assuming the goal is not reached) and for taxes, which is $77.50.
  • $1 if the contributor selects a Kindle Copy
  • $5.80 to ship the book, thank-you note, and photos
  • $6 to buy and ship the book to me to sign for the contributor
  • $.50 for the thank-you note
  • $1.15 to send the postcard from Cannes
  • $1.30 to buy the postcard in Cannes
  • $1.90 to buy printed copies of the photos
  • And this mystery gift. The problem with estimating this cost is that I really have no idea how much this will cost--I don't know what the gift will be, although I DO know it will be awesome. It will have to be fairly small though, since I have to transport all of them back with me. I expect it will be $13-$39.
  • Another $5.80 to ship the mystery gift domestically, if it does not fit with the book, note, and photos

Approximate total cost of this perk: $139.95

So, $110 is actually contributed toward my campaign with each DISTRIBUTOR, and if 9 people contribute with this award, my campaign will be fully funded.

 

THE PRODUCER

If you contribute $800, I will Skype (or use Google hangout) you during the festival! You will be able to see firsthand what the festival is like. Of course, I don't know the details yet, like when during the day I'll be free or where there will be Internet access, but it should be pretty fun! Plus, you will receive EVERY other award listed above. If the contributor is shipping internationally (outside the U.S.) it will be an additional $15.

Why the price?

  • 31% is immediately taken out, which totals $248
  • $1 if the contributor selects a Kindle Copy
  • $5.80 to ship the book, thank-you note, and photos
  • $6 to buy and ship the book to me to sign for the contributor
  • $.50 for the thank-you note
  • $1.15 to send the postcard from Cannes
  • $1.30 to buy the postcard in Cannes
  • $1.90 to buy printed copies of the photos
  • And this mystery gift. The problem with estimating this cost is that I really have no idea how much this will cost--I don't know what the gift will be, although I DO know it will be awesome. It will have to be fairly small though, since I have to transport all of them back with me. I expect it will be $13-$39.
  • Another $5.80 to ship the mystery gift domestically, if it does not fit with the book, note, and photos

Approximate total cost of this perk: $310.45

So, $489.55 is contributed toward my campaign with each PRODUCER, and if 3 people contribute with this award, my campaign will be fully funded.

 

The Impact

My intention with this project is to create a book that will serve as an inside look into the Cannes Film Festival and life on the French Riviera. I hope that future students interning at Cannes will be able to read my book and know what they can expect when they work for those two weeks in May. 

Also, I would be so happy if reading my book stirred more people to travel. I believe traveling and interacting with people of different backgrounds is an essential part of life.  I think many problems arise out of simple misunderstandings. 

Plus, I want to make sure that I remember as much as possible about this internship. And you know what? I actually love writing, so I probably would have done this even without the Indiegogo.

And I'm pretty sure my parents will want to know what sort of shennanigans I had at Cannes (although maybe not all of them).

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're still reading this (and if you are, my hat's off to you, because this is LONG), and are unsure or unable to contribute to my campaign, I understand. Not everyone can contribute.

But I would SUPER appreciate it if you took a moment or two to share this campaign with your friends, family, or anyone else you think might be interested. If your efforts got even one person to contribute, that would be great!

There are also a few ways you can share this campaign through Indiegogo, which can be found under the video.

Thanks for reading this and contributing! I hope to send you a book of my time in Cannes very soon!
story_txt:
Why Does This Exist?
Hello there! If you are reading this, congratulations! You have stumbled upon a project of grave importance for all citizens of the world.
Not really.
My name is Kelsey Miller. I am a business student in New England majoring in Corporate Finance and Accounting with a minor in Creative Writing. Yeah, that's a pretty weird combination, I know, but it led me to being accepted as one of about 150 interns at the Cannes Film Festival!
You could say that I'm excited.
I created this campaign in order to pay off the last expenses of the internship (like airfare), but the purpose of this project is to fund a book I'll write about my time in Cannes. I published a book back in 2011, so if you're thinking that this might be some teenager's travel diary, have no fear! It will be an insightful and entertaining look into life at the festival.
And to be completely honest, if my book can motivate students to pursue careers in the film industry (even if they're business students, like me) or even to cultivate a love of traveling, that would be AWESOME. I think that would be the most rewarding thing for me.
If that sounds pretty cool (and believe me, it is) then take a look at these nifty perks I have in conjunction with the project.
 


What I Need 
Okay, so like literally everything these days, this internship is pretty expensive. I've already covered some of the costs, like the $3500 program fee, but I'll need a little help covering the rest. 
Here is what my campaign funds will cover: 
Publishing the Book: Of course, there will be costs associated with publishing the book. Luckily, with Amazon's publishing services, Createspace and Kindle Direct Publishing, these costs are minimal. They should be around $25. I'm not kidding. 
Airfare: I have to actually get to Cannes, yeah? Luckily, I should be able to use frequent flyer miles to get to Paris, but then I'll need a second flight all the way down to Nice, which is a town (or ville, as they say in France) over from Cannes. This round-trip flight should cost around $400.
Gown: I know what you're all thinking; this is just an excuse to go shopping. Nope. Not at all. I'm actually not a shopaholic (I get tired--walking around malls all day is exhausting). However, there is a strict dress code at Cannes, and they'll actually kick you out of an event if you're not dressed correctly! That would be pretty humiliating, for both myself and my employer, so I want to make sure I have a nice gown to wear to these events. I think $500 should buy a decent gown, which is actually a low amount for a formal outfit.
Food: I have to survive, you know. I'd like about 50 Euros a day to spend on food, since I'll have to take care of two meals per day. So, for ten days of food that will be $650, because of the exchange rate. I'm pretty excited, because Cannes has all of these markets where you can buy fresh food. I'll also be able to parler en Français!
Business Cards: This is a job, after all. I'll need to have a way for people, like my employer, to contact me. I've already set up some cards on Moo.com, which total $100. That's for 200 business cards.
This totals to $1,675. Of course, I'd also like to some additional funds, like spending money to buy something for my mom, a newer camera to update the blogs with SUPER AWESOME photos, and a second gown, so that people don't begin to suspect I smell. 
However, going over my goal can only result in GOOD THINGS for the people funding my campaign, like extra perks and SURPRISES.
Hint, hint.
Also: My campaign is flexible, which means that whatever money is raised I'll keep, regardless of whether I raise the amount listed. If, by some unbelievably unfortunate circumstance I cannot raise all of the funds, I'll put the money toward these areas in order, starting with the publishing costs and ending with business cards.
ONE MORE THING: You'll notice that I'm not asking for $1,675. That is because Indiegogo will take out 4% of the money as a commission (it's 9% if it is not fully funded) and 3% for credit card processing. On top of this, I may have to pay taxes on the funds received (it's hard to know for sure, since current legislature was written before the era of crowdfunding, but I'm assuming I'll have to pay taxes). Federal, state, and local taxes come to 19% of my income.
So, I can expect 26% of the funds I raise to be taken out before I see even a penny. Therefore, I need to take this into consideration when setting a goal for my campaign. 
This new amount comes to $2,264, which is what you'll see in the Funding Goal.
 


What You Get
And now for what you're all really interested in--the perks. Just like in the festival, there is a hierarchy to these perks, starting out with the lowly intern and ending with the godlike producer. Best of all, these perks are cumulative, so if you sign up for one a few links up the chain, you'll get all the perks below it!
Excited yet? 
Here is a better explanation of each perk, including an explanation of the prices:
THE INTERN
People who contribute $10 will receive access to a blog updated in real-time with pictures, excerpts from the book, videos, and more. I know what you're thinking; I can just find it on the internet! Not so. This blog will be SUPER SECRET, which means you can only access it if you have a password. You'll also get a shout-out in the acknowledgements.
Why the price?
About 31% will be taken out for Indiegogo's processing fees and my taxes (this is higher than the 26%, in case the total is not raised and I have to pay a higher fee to Indiegogo), so $3.10 will be removed from the contribution before I even see it!
Approximate total cost of this perk: $3.10
So, $6.90 is actually contributed toward my campaign (the $1,675 I actually need) with each INTERN, and if 227 people contributed with this perk, my campaign will be fully funded, since the amount that is immediately taken out drops from 31% to 26% once the campaign reaches the goal (more is contributed to the $1,675 with each perk when this happens).
 
THE ACTOR
If you contribute $25, you will receive a digital copy of the book, which will come in two formats: PDF and Kindle. You will also receive the INTERN perk. 
Why the price?
Again, 31% will be taken out right away, which is $7.75. Also, if you select a Kindle copy, it will cost $1 to send it with the correct formatting.  
Approximate total cost of this perk: $8.75
So, $16.25 is actually contributed toward my campaign with each ACTOR, and if 91 people contributed with this perk, my campaign will be fully funded.
 
THE FILMMAKER
If you contribute $50, you will receive a signed copy of the book, as well as a personalized thank-you note. You will also receive the INTERN and ACTOR perks. If the contributor is shipping internationally (outside the U.S.) it will be an additional $15.
Why the price?
Again, 31% is taken out, which amounts to $15.50. There will be an additional $1 in cost if you select a Kindle Copy. It will cost $5.80 to ship the book and thank-you note to the contributor within the U.S., based on the flat rate of Media Mail with the USPS.
It will also cost at least another $5 to buy the book (Amazon has to make money, too) and some other amount to ship it to me so that I can sign it. That amount is harder to estimate, since I will buy the total number of books needed at once, and that will spread the shipping costs over the books ordered. Let's say that amount is $1. I'll also need to buy a bunch of thank-you notes, so that will probably be $.50 a card.
Approximate total cost of this perk: $28.80
So, $21.20 is contributed toward my campaign with each FILMMAKER, and if 46 people contribute with this perk, my campaign will be fully funded.
 
THE SELLER
If you contribute $100, you will receive a postcard from Cannes, as well as exclusive photos not found on the blog. You will also receive the INTERN, ACTOR, and FILMMAKER perks. If the contributor is shipping internationally (outside the U.S.) it will be an additional $15.
Why the price?

31% is immediately taken out for Indiegogo (again, assuming the goal is not reached, so that I'm not surprised by additional costs) and for taxes, which is $31.
$1 if the contributor selects a Kindle Copy
$5.80 to ship the book, thank-you note, and photos
$6 to buy and ship the book to me to sign for the contributor
$.50 for the thank-you note
$1.15 to send the postcard from Cannes
$1.30 to buy the postcard in Cannes
$1.90 to buy printed copies of the photos

Approximate total cost of this perk: $48.65
So, $51.35 is contributed toward my campaign with each SELLER, and if 23 people contribute with this perk, my campaign will be fully funded.

You will also receive the INTERN, ACTOR, FILMMAKER, and SELLER perks. If the contributor is shipping internationally (outside the U.S.) it will be an additional $15.

story:
A story worth telling 

Inspired by a friend’s astounding journey to find love again against all odds, after betrayal, heartbreak and self-doubts, I set out to pursue my passion and write a romantic novel to be published online. My goal was to let the world know that things happen for a reason, even if they seem cruel and unjust in the first place. Just listen to your heart and trust in love and yourself. And, with a little patience, the rest will follow. I truly believe that this is a story well worth telling: It will inspire people to look at the bright side of life even when the sun does not shine. 

I am nearly there. So far, I have been writing in the little free time I have. At night after work. On weekends. During holidays. However, despite gargantuan efforts and neglecting family and social life, I am running out of time: I promised my friend to get our book published by Christmas this year. This is only a little over four months away! [gasp!] 


Help me get the word out

This is where you, dear friends, come in: Please help me finish and publish ‘Love at first Click - Lucy's Story’ by contributing with a small donation to my monthly living costs for the last stretch from now until December. This will allow me to focus on writing, editing and proofreading the book to get it ready on time for Santa Claus. I would also like to set up a website for people to follow my project, give feedback on the book and share their experiences. My savings won’t take me all the way to get my dream realised. Your support is needed to enable me to cut down my ‘working’ hours (I am a fulltime English tutor) and invest more time into my writing. 

I am asking for a total of € 2000, which works out to € 500 per month to cover my running costs. Coupled with savings, this should be enough to get me through to December. 

So, perhaps I can incite you to make a small donation for my project? € 10 or even € 25 might not seem much for you, but is huge for me and the book. 

Obviously, there is no giving without receiving. Take a look at the site - I have complied a list of perks for those of you who decide to support me. Depending on the amount, you will receive a free (online) copy of the book, be mentioned in the acknowledgments or even get a character named after you.  

Together we can make this happen. 

THANK YOU TO EACH AND EVERYONE OF YOU!

Love, 

Cate

PS: Perhaps I could ask you to make some noise not only about the campaign but also about the book itself? Lets get the word out together and make this world a more optimistic place!

Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools.

Synopsis

‘Love at first Click - Lucy's Story’ is an inspiring story about a woman in her mid-thirties whose world comes to a standstill after her fiancé leaves her just days before their wedding. We have all had our hearts broken, but hers gets spectacularly shattered. Being single after many comfortable years in a relationship is a scary prospect, especially for someone who truly believes her best and most beautiful years are long behind her. Convinced she will never find love again, let alone have a family, she sets out to reclaim her life and passion against all odds and unexpectedly meets Mr Perfect.  

Follow me on twitter:@cate_cole

story:
Liberty Whole Volume One Issues 1-26

You can find the Liberty Whole Volume One eBook at http://www.readliberty.org/books/liberty-whole-volume-one.

Instead Of a Book, By Men Too Modest To Write One

Instead Of a Book, By Men Too Modest To Write One is a selection of articles from the first volume of Liberty edited by Lukas Nikodym and Tomas Nikodym with a foreword by Lawrence W. Reed. http://www.readliberty.org/books/instead-of-a-book-by-men-too-modest-to-write-one.

Download the books to your eBook reader, print them or do whatever else you want with them. Happy reading, sharing, editing and selling!

Stretch goal Nº1 - Proofreading

Thanks to one of our readers, who have found a hard to miss mistranscription at the beginning of the first issue of Liberty, we have come up with an idea for a new perk - Proofreader.

Along the Supporters page there will be a Proofreaders page at the end of the book containing names and scores of the people who have found and/or fixed a mistranscription in Liberty at ReadLiberty.org.

To claim the perk you can write a comment here in the Comments tab, contact the people at ReadLiberty.org or correct the mistake directly in the GitHub repository.

Would you help us spread the word?

                       

Become a part of the first Liberty's book

The purpose of ReadLiberty.org is to transcribe, preserve and spread all 403 issues of Liberty, Not the Daughter But the Mother of Order, an individualist anarchist periodical originally edited and published by Benjamin Tucker from 1881 to 1908.

As part of our activities we have decided to publish the whole Volume I of Liberty in the form of an eBook in ePub, Mobi and PDF formats. In the phase one an eBook containing issues 1-13 of the original Volume I will be made available. Once they are all transcribed, the eBook will be updated to contain all 26 issues of the original Volume I. And you can be a part of the book!

When can you expect the book?

What do we need the funds for?

Although everything published by ReadLiberty.org is free to use in the true sense of the word and we're transcribing, preserving and spreading the Liberty in our free time for our entertainment, we still need to pay our external partners for their services.

It's estimated we'll need about $500 for a decent typographic cover image and other graphic work, the typesetting, to pay the Indiegogo platform fees and to have a little reserve left just in case.

You can help us make it all happen by becoming a part of the book and sharing the campaign with your friends and followers.

Why would we like to publish this book?

An eBook published in all of the most common formats (ePub, Mobi, PDF) is a perfect way to spread the already transcribed and hopefully preserved issues of Liberty.

Why do we want you to be a part of the book?

We're transcribing Liberty not only for our own entertainment but for yours as well.

We really love Liberty and although we can't agree with every view of its original authors we still enjoy transcribing and reading every single article. And is there something better than being a part of something you love?

Would you like to be a Liberty book's Associate Producer?

Then share the campaign with your friends and followers! Up to two of you, who will bring either the highest number of contributors or the highest amount of contributions to the campaign will be offered an Associate Producer credit. Just Log In and start sharing by using the Share Bar tools under the introductory video.

You can of course become an Associate Producer of the book right away by claiming the Associate Producer perk.

Questions and Answers

Q: Is this an official ReadLiberty.org crowdfunding campaign?
A: Yes, it is. You can check the announcement at ReadLiberty.org/indiegogo-campaign

Q: What would you do with the funds risen over the goal?
A: The funds would be used for further expansion of our activities.

Q: Is my contribution tax deductible?
A: Unfortunately for all of us it most probably isn't. On the other side, as a gift it is not subject to tax on our side either.

Q: What license will be the book subject to?
A: Liberty itself is in the public domain. As we don't believe in the concept of IP the book will be a subject to the CC0 "license". Although you don't have to we'll be thankful if you choose to mark us as the authors of the transcription and let others to use the work in the same way. Happy reading, sharing, editing and selling!

Q: Does it mean that I can print and sell the book?
A: Yes, you can! We'd definitely buy the book in a printed form. Just make it clear that we're not printing and selling it. Also if you are selling the book for profit consider sharing part of that profit with John Zube, founder of the Libertarian Microfiche Publishing, Shawn P. Wilbur, author of the PDF version of the Liberty, or ReadLiberty.org, authors of the transcriptions and the book.

Q: Is it possible to contribute in Bitcoins, Litecoins or Feathercoins?
A: Yes, but not directly. Any BTC, LTC and FTC donated to us during the campaign will be converted to FRNs and transferred to the campaign.

Q: Who will be the typographic artist?
A: It will be Juan Osborne and we'd like you to be a part of his new typographic portrait.

Typographic portrait of Dennis Ritchie by Juan Osborne.


Would you help us spread the word?

                       


Thanks for your support.

Cheers, Martin

ReadLiberty.org

A MiceEatCheese production.

The purpose of ReadLiberty.org is to transcribe, preserve and spread all 403 issues of Liberty, Not the Daughter But the Mother of Order, an individualist anarchist periodical originally edited and published by Benjamin Tucker from 1881 to 1908.
As part of our activities we have decided to publish the whole Volume I of Liberty in the form of an eBook in ePub, Mobi and PDF formats. In the phase one an eBook containing issues 1-13 of the original Volume I will be made available. Once they are all transcribed, the eBook will be updated to contain all 26 issues of the original Volume I. And you can be a part of the book!
When can you expect the book?

What do we need the funds for?
Although everything published by ReadLiberty.org is free to use in the true sense of the word and we're transcribing, preserving and spreading the Liberty in our free time for our entertainment, we still need to pay our external partners for their services.
It's estimated we'll need about $500 for a decent typographic cover image and other graphic work, the typesetting, to pay the Indiegogo platform fees and to have a little reserve left just in case.
You can help us make it all happen by becoming a part of the book and sharing the campaign with your friends and followers.
Why would we like to publish this book?
An eBook published in all of the most common formats (ePub, Mobi, PDF) is a perfect way to spread the already transcribed and hopefully preserved issues of Liberty.
Why do we want you to be a part of the book?
We're transcribing Liberty not only for our own entertainment but for yours as well.
We really love Liberty and although we can't agree with every view of its original authors we still enjoy transcribing and reading every single article. And is there something better than being a part of something you love?
Would you like to be a Liberty book's Associate Producer?
Then share the campaign with your friends and followers! Up to two of you, who will bring either the highest number of contributors or the highest amount of contributions to the campaign will be offered an Associate Producer credit. Just Log In and start sharing by using the Share Bar tools under the introductory video.
You can of course become an Associate Producer of the book right away by claiming the Associate Producer perk.
Questions and Answers
Q: Is this an official ReadLiberty.org crowdfunding campaign?A: Yes, it is. You can check the announcement at ReadLiberty.org/indiegogo-campaign
Q: What would you do with the funds risen over the goal?A: The funds would be used for further expansion of our activities.
Q: Is my contribution tax deductible?A: Unfortunately for all of us it most probably isn't. On the other side, as a gift it is not subject to tax on our side either.
Q: What license will be the book subject to?
A: Liberty itself is in the public domain. As we don't believe in the concept of IP the book will be a subject to the CC0 "license". Although you don't have to we'll be thankful if you choose to mark us as the authors of the transcription and let others to use the work in the same way. Happy reading, sharing, editing and selling!
Q: Does it mean that I can print and sell the book?
A: Yes, you can! We'd definitely buy the book in a printed form. Just make it clear that we're not printing and selling it. Also if you are selling the book for profit consider sharing part of that profit with John Zube, founder of the Libertarian Microfiche Publishing, Shawn P. Wilbur, author of the PDF version of the Liberty, or ReadLiberty.org, authors of the transcriptions and the book.
Q: Is it possible to contribute in Bitcoins, Litecoins or Feathercoins?
A: Yes, but not directly. Any BTC, LTC and FTC donated to us during the campaign will be converted to FRNs and transferred to the campaign.
Q: Who will be the typographic artist?A: It will be Juan Osborne and we'd like you to be a part of his new typographic portrait.

Typographic portrait of Dennis Ritchie by Juan Osborne.

Would you help us spread the word?
     

     

     

     



Thanks for your support.
Cheers, Martin
ReadLiberty.org
A MiceEatCheese production.

story:
Starting in the fall of 2012, Sabrina Liedtke created Style on the Hill (SOTH) as an online platform documenting every aspect of style, entertainment and culture throughout KU and the Lawrence community. Since its humble beginnings, SOTH has garnered more than 1,300 fans, reaching more than half a million Facebook users, with a combined following of more than 1,000 Instagram and Twitter followers. Now the 25+ staff is expanding its content to an exclusive print publication titled “The Hill,” which will be dedicated to entertainment and lifestyle content. It will be the only publication of its kind on the University of Kansas campus.

What you need to know

  • 80-page, bound publication complete with full-length articles and full-color photography, as well as an original layout and design – all created by KU students.
  • Circulation of 2,500 copies distributed on campus, residence halls, Greek houses, lecture halls, and supporting businesses.
  • Published twice a semester with the inaugural copy being released April 30 at the launch party, and the remainder of the copies becoming available to the Lawrence community on May 1.
  • Digital copy of the magazine available for viewers to access on their tablets, computers and smartphones.

Why should you support The Hill?

Our talented staff of KU student writers, photographers and designers have devoted a great deal of time toward making The Hill a source of pride, sometimes even at the expense of our academics. Our team considers this endeavor more promising, challenging and worthwhile than any classroom exercise, as it provides us with an educational and realistic opportunity to demonstrate our initiative and creativity.

Anyone can blog and start a website, but not everyone has the dedication, innovation and tenacity to publish a print magazine.

 

Support the creativity and hardwork of KU students now!

story:
The Book 

So I started thinking, what’s interesting about my life? What could I write about? I haven't done anything. The only thing I’ve done most of my adult life is go to college, stay unemployed, run, drink and hook up with girls. I haven’t really grown up like my other friends have. My other friends have jobs, homes, wives, kids. I’ve been watching everyone get married and start their lives. I was the best man in a friend’s wedding and I’ll be the best man in two other friend's weddings. As I was thinking about this, it hit me. This is my book! I’ll write a book about post-college life. A book about drinking, hooking up with girls, and being the best man in three weddings. A book about love, marriage, divorce and growing up.


The Impact

This will be the funniest, wittiest and most heartwarming book you have ever read by a new undiscovered author.


What We Need & What You Get

I am asking for $2,000 dollars to pay for publishing cost, artwork and website.

Blog

http://henrycvaldez.blogspot.com/

story:
Story of My Book

One Decision Away creates exposure to varying levels of trauma, an inevitability within our lives. Our abilities to cope with that trauma (or lack thereof) creates a pathway of choices, pathways in which we are always one decision away from embracing the unforeseen lesson through a conduit of grace or through a conduit of manifested hatred. Single reactive decisions compel the power to alter the course of our lives. How you perceive the world before your eyes will construct EVERYTHING in your life. 

My name is (April) Emiry Callum and I am the author of One Decision Away. I wrote this book to delve into the worlds and minds of trauma-based scenarios, many of which may resonate deeply with contemporary social problems, and while it exposes the intricacies of depression, the recurring theme of unwavering hope forged with mental fortitude, aimed at healing a shattered spirit is remarkably present. Hope is never lost even when the world seemingly conspires against you. 

It is my sincere hope that if you have experienced any amount of trauma within your life, my book will inspire recognition that you are not alone in this world. There is purposeful solidarity and cohesion to be found in your experience. 

In this book, you'll encounter multifaceted dimensions of personal stories through narratives of different dynamics of trauma such as:

 

  • Family Trauma
  • Family Legacy
  • Mental Health Awareness / Suicide Prevention
  • Relationships and Heartache 
  • Personal Adversity
  • Military Achievements 
  • Domestic Abuse
  • Drug Addictions
  • Body Image/ Value of Self Worth
  • Life with furry loved ones
  • Acceptance of Death

You will love this book whether you feel compelled to believe in fate as a fortuitous energy of nature or a menacing and ruthless arch-nemesis in life’s metaphorical game of chess (where you are nothing more than a pawn), and by the power of energy, the power of luck, or sheer happenstance, this book has somehow integrated its way into your life and into your hands.

One Decision Away speaks to those who want to be empowered as a human being, as more than a broken soul. Trauma and dysfunction displaced within our lives present opportunities to create life-enhancing decisions conducive to functionality in a turbulent world. Our willingness to harness these challenges and opportunities creates a fresh mindset of determination to create new opportunities for our own life. And perhaps, through the insight and perspective of those who share in our struggles within these stories, we too may discover inner peace and closure within our own lives. 

Ultimately, I hope that One Decision Away inspires reflective and profound dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

 

  • How is the trauma in my life affecting my personal and professional relationships? 
  • How can I empower my life to deal with my trauma constructively, for the betterment of my self-preservation and inner peace? 
  • How do these personal stories relate to those I love, and my own self worth? 
     

I really look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. Coming together and discussing how embracing trauma through a conduit of grace and empowerment may change us all for the better. 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020.

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter 2020.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish it. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

 

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish it.
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book.
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book.
  • And more...

 

About the Author


Emiry Callum is a military veteran, once serving both in the United States Navy and the United States Air Force, serving as both active duty and reservist personnel. Although her birthplace resides in Houston, TX, a majority of her childhood and adulthood was spent considerably as a Tampa, FL native. She completed her academic studies at the University of Central Florida with a Bachelor of Arts in Human Communication and Journalism.

"To claim a single book changed the perception of my entire world is no exaggeration of the matter. In the metaphorical and literal sense, one book altered the path of my universe and empowered the course of the trauma in my life into a profound learning experience. A single decision to read one book changed my life. It empowered me as a woman, as a human being, as more than a broken soul. For the majority of my childhood, my life was inundated with depression, thoughts of suicide, emotions, and experiences which a child should never experience, and it is my hope that this book may inspire hope in the lives of others. 

I’m no expert by any means on any subject matter outside of my own life. I’m not a celebrity or anyone considered influential and this is admittedly the first time I’ve ever written a book (although becoming an author has always been a lifelong dream of mine). But where I lack formal accreditation, I certainly compensate with experiential genuineness in my stories, and the stories of others who have been willing to share their fervent experiences."

For more information you can connect with Emiry at oda.onedecisionaway@gmail.com and {Twitter: One Decision Away @aprilemiry} - {Facebook: fb.me/ODA.onedecisionaway}- {Instagram:@secretlifeofwonderwoman}

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone for publishing. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #ODAonedecisionaway and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

I am so incredibly grateful for all of your love and support! Thank you!!

Thank you for sharing my journey with me,
Emiry Callum

story:
Story of My Book

Gratitude is the Answer - After suffering for 8 years with a mystery illness, I found a path back to health and true happiness rooted in gratitude, and the amazing power of our thoughts. After extensive research and hearing others’ similar stories I felt the need to share what I learned through a book.

My name is Jennifer Garman and I am the author of Gratitude is the Answer. I wrote this book because I needed to share the life-altering effects gratitude can have on one’s life.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover why gratitude is so impactful, and how to implement it into your life. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for gratitude in you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you implement gratitude and transform your life.

In this book, you'll learn about why happiness is a choice and how gratitude can offset a negative mindset, including stories about:

  • How a professional athlete at the peak of his career lost everything, but ultimately gained even more back than he had before tragedy hit.
  • How Sheryl Sandberg used gratitude to cope with losing her husband and find joy and happiness again in her life.
  • How a man who broke is back in a catastrophic accident and was told he would never walk again, yet through the power of his thoughts was able to regain his health entirely.

You will love this book if you feel a lack of happiness, experience anxiety/depression, or are stuck in a negative mindset.

Gratitude is the Answer is a non-fiction book that speaks to anyone struggling or feeling at a loss in life and who are looking to transform their life through gratitude for the first time.

The Book - Gratitude is the Answer

The book is written in 3 Parts....

Part 1 contains the Introduction + Chapter 1. It all starts with my story. I explain in this part how I came to find gratitude coupled with the power of my thoughts, the effect it had on my health and life, and why I felt compelled to share this with others through a book.

Part 2 contains Chapters 2-8. In this section I will go into the science behind gratitude and the many ways it has been proven to impact one’s life in a positive way. These chapters also contain powerful inspirational stories from many people I interviewed and researched, and how gratitude has changed the trajectory of their life in amazing ways.

Part 3 contains Chapters 9-10. This is the part where you will learn how to implement gratitude into your life to have the biggest impact--it’s the “how to” section. I break it down into easy-to-implement chunks that you can incorporate into your busy schedule immediately, and see the transformational effect firsthand. After you are inspired by all those you will read about, I know you will want to add gratitude into your life as well.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish next spring.

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.



I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more....

About the Author

I graduated as a computer engineer and worked at HP before shifting into the medical sector. I have worked in marketing for both the pharmaceutical and medical device industries before becoming a certified life coach and starting my own business GratitudeMission.org in 2017, which I continue to lead today with a mission to implement gratitude into every school.

After studying to become a life coach it became obvious to me that gratitude was one of the biggest influencers of one’s happiness. After personally experiencing the life-changing effects of changing my thoughts coupled with gratitude, I knew I needed to share what I found with others.

I have a passion for helping others, especially kids. When I first discovered gratitude, I knew I needed to find a way to teach it to my own kids first, and that grew into my company, GratitudeMission.org.

For more information you can connect with me at thegratitudemission@gmail.com and on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #gratitudeistheanswer and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

With gratitude,
Jennifer Garman

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish next spring.
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
And more....
About the AuthorI graduated as a computer engineer and worked at HP before shifting into the medical sector. I have worked in marketing for both the pharmaceutical and medical device industries before becoming a certified life coach and starting my own business GratitudeMission.org in 2017, which I continue to lead today with a mission to implement gratitude into every school.After studying to become a life coach it became obvious to me that gratitude was one of the biggest influencers of one’s happiness. After personally experiencing the life-changing effects of changing my thoughts coupled with gratitude, I knew I needed to share what I found with others.I have a passion for helping others, especially kids. When I first discovered gratitude, I knew I needed to find a way to teach it to my own kids first, and that grew into my company, GratitudeMission.org.For more information you can connect with me at thegratitudemission@gmail.com and on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.Risks & ChallengesThe biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #gratitudeistheanswer and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.
Thank you so much of all of your love and support!With gratitude,Jennifer Garman

story:
What Is Athletes For God?

www.AthletesForGod.com is a website for players and coaches to share first-person stories about their careers and faith. The site launched last July 6, and since that time it has published 47 stories and earned over 640,000 page views!
 

Why I need your help

Running the website costs money...So far I've spent over $30,000 of my own money, which is most of my life savings, to bring these messages of hope and inspiration to you. 

Here's the main costs I encounter:

  • 1) Traveling to meet up with the athlete or coach for the interview/photoshoots
  • 2) Advertising each story on Facebook so the article can appear on the newsfeeds of each fan base. That's what helps the site grow!

What your donation will do

Your donation will help keep expand the website to new heights. In addition to helping me travel to the interviews/photoshoots, your donations will also allow me to expand the Facebook ads beyond just Christian fans of each team. I want readers of all denominations to see this website!

What you will get in return

Ever donor, regardless of the donation size, will have their name appear on a "Thank You" page. For bigger donations I have some tokens of appreciation!

  • A $20 donation will get you a 4 x 4 inch bumper sticker with the Athletes For God logo
  • A $40 donation will get you an Athletes For God coffee mug
  • A $60 donation will get you an Athletes For God tumblr
  • An $80 donation will get you an Athletes For God t-shirt
  • A $100 donation lets you get any two items of your choice
  • A $120 donation lets you get any and all of the items you like :)

story:
Overview

The $100 Million Exit is a non-fiction business book for entrepreneurs and other business owners who want to improve their companies and be better prepared for an ultimate exit.

“Over the course of my more than 20 years leading mergers and acquisitions, I have seen business owners leave significant money on the table or even fail to complete their M&A transactions. I was frustrated to see them fail to achieve the best possible outcome, professionally and personally. I decided to write this book to help all business owners avoid those exit problems.” - Jonathan Brabrand


My book will publish in April 2020.

 

Story of My Book

The $100 Million Exit: Lessons for Every Business Owner analyzes large mergers and acquisitions (M&A) successes and failures to draw practical, actionable advice that company owners can implement to increase the value of their business and be better prepared for an exit.

My name is Jonathan Brabrand and I am the author of The $100 Million Exit: Lessons for Every Business Owner. I wrote this book because I want to demystify the exit process and help entrepreneurs and other business owners learn the insider secrets behind real-world M&A transactions that they can use to ultimately drive a higher exit value for their company.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will better understand how to make the most of your future exit process. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for the art of the M&A exit in you. And then ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you take actionable steps that will drive a higher exit value when the time comes for your exit.

In this book, you'll learn about preparing today for a future exit and critical steps you should take during the M&A process:

  • Know When the Time is Right to Exit - hear how two co-founders knew for sure that it was time to exit their business, and how that decision made all the difference in their company’s future growth trajectory
  • The Importance of Positioning - learn how nuanced positioning enabled a multi-billion dollar merger to occur that created a consumer-facing monopoly in the U.S. and how positioning your business well will drive a premium valuation
  • There’s More to Maximize than Price - see how savvy co-founders knew with complete confidence that the buyer with the third-highest bid was the best choice for their business and employees.

 

You will love this book if you want to learn how the art and science of the M&A process can be leveraged to your advantage.

The $100 Million Exit is a non-fiction book that speaks to business owners and their trusted confidantes who want a behind-the-scenes look at what really drives spike offers for businesses.

 

The Book - The $100 Million Exit

The book is written in Three Parts:

Part 1, Achieving a Sale-Ready Posture, contains the introduction + 4 additional chapters. This section covers how to plant seeds with potential industry buyers before you are ever ready to sell, how to manage your business like buyers will expect, how to create a business with intrinsic value apart from your personal involvement, and how to know when the time to exit has arrived.

Part 2, Kicking off the M&A Process, contains Chapters 5-8. Here, we learn why you need an M&A advisor and how to find the best one for your process, how to methodically prepare for the M&A process to retain negotiating leverage and momentum throughout, use positioning strategies to attract aggressive buyers, and fully understand the available exit options to pursue those that match your desired outcome.

Part 3, Crushing the M&A Process, contains Chapters 9-11. This section focuses on the final push of an M&A process, closing the deal with your selected buyer, and teaches that there are more important factors to maximize than price alone, that minimizing surprises is the key to avoiding a re-trade, and that you should keep the deal as simple as possible.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor who I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Spring

 

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.



I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • You will also receive a personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author

Jonathan Brabrand is Managing Director of Fahrenheit Capital Partners, a boutique M&A advisory firm. He has spent over 20 years helping business owners within a wide variety of industries sell their companies to their ideal buyer and achieve the exit outcome they dreamed of.

I wrote this book to make sure no business owner is unprepared for their exit and leaves no money on the table when they sell their company. After all of the years of hard work and capital you’ve put into growing your business, I want your exit to be the best possible outcome, leaving you with no regrets.

Jonathan lives in Richmond, Virginia and is a devoted husband and father to his six children. In his free time, he enjoys playing the piano, tending the family chickens, and tinkering with his vintage Chevy pickup and off-road Jeep Wrangler.

For more information you can connect with Jonathan at jbrabrand@gmail.com and https://www.linkedin.com/in/jbrabrand/.

 

Risks & Challenges

One of the biggest challenges with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #100MMExit and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Jonathan

story:
Janz Gornik, a member of Mensa the High IQ Society, which brings together the smartest minds on the planet, aims through his book to transfer in a simple and clear manner his knowledge, to the younger generations. Familiarising them with different problem solving methods and approaches in an interesting collection of IQ exercises.
 

Help us publish the IQ UNIVERSE (A5, 100pag) in English and spread it Worldwide. 
While collecting Charity funds for our regional Development Center for Children with Special Needs! 

*BOOK PREVIEW (Try out our exercises) in pdf.
*Development Center Magazine (get to know them better) in pdf.

Every Backer will be able to Personally choose where his money will be allocated. 

- Fund for field trips and other extracurricular activities. 
- School supplies fund for socially vulnerable kids. 
- School main fund (for all other needs). 

Despite the struggling budget the Development Center Elvira Vatovec did an amazing work over the years changing lives of countless children and helping them find their place in the world. 

Watch the Children from CUEV have fun with Santa Clauses on Motorbikes! 

Our Goal

Our goal is to collect 1500€ which will help us publish IQ UNIVERSE, whilst at the same time delivering on our promise of collecting at least 300€ towards the budget of the Developement Center. All additional funds will be an immense plus, helping us shaping a better future and drawing a smile on those kids, who deserve it more than anything!
*(More books = Less will printing costs per book. Allowing us more money for charity.)

TIMELINE: We will launch a 30 days Campaign on the 1st of November. 
We will ship the books at the beginning of December, so that all the backers will receive their copy before Christmas. 
P.s. Yes, You're right! This can be the ultimate Christmas present for your loved ones! :)
We plan to hand over the Charity funds on the 23rd of December!
Right in time for the Traditional Yearly Christmas Play organised by the Development Center Elvira Vatovec for Children with Special Needs. 

The Impact

The IQ Universe contains an interesting and 'sui generis' approach to abstract reasoning exercises. The book was intended for teenagers, but we strongly recommend it to adults as well. 

Our 1st Test Group (72 individuals) noticed an average increase of their score by 31%!

IQ Universe's Place in the World

In a technology era where traditional values and costumes are disappearing, substituted by various technological advances, reading books is becoming outdated and imagination became a luxury good.

Nowadays, the youngsters always seem to be followed around by notifications and beeping sounds of their phones. IQ Universe aims to divert the their attention away from their phone screens, and to spur their brain activity.

Get the IQ Universe as a present for yourself, get it for your kids, get it for your students. Our promise to every book buyer is that you will be entertained. You will do brain and mind activity. We promise that you will spend time by yourself, alone, thinking. Thinking how to solve the tasks ahead of you. 

"Our promise may not give you a lot more,
than some quality time, spent in your own company. "

Our Appeal (every type of help is very welcome)

I know that unfortunately, some people are simply unable to contribute. I understand. 
We were all in this situation before. 
However, even without contribution you can still help. You can share. You can spread the word. 
We will be gratefull nevertheless for every thought, help, like or share. :) 

THANK YOU!

*A special Thank You goes to those who made this campaign possible:
Karin Franjčič (Volunteer), Olga Stele (Headmaster's Assistant) and Korado Lešnik (Headmaster) of the Development Center Elvira Vatovec. 

My inspiration (my niece Tamy) with her Slovenian language version of the book.
